title: (x) illy logo script - custom designed (similar to Mr Sheppards) {Yves}
content:
Hi all,

I came across this logo in the window of my local deli. Can anyone tell me what the font is?

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content: Try [Mr Sheppards](http://web.archive.org/web/20061114142316/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000081) from [The Charles Bluemlein Script Collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20061114142316/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=bluemlein%20script%20collection&producttype=TYP&pricemodel=RM%2CRF) from [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Sudtipos).
